ESG Working Group
Our ESG working group is a cross-functional group of 
individuals representing the entire organization, including 
team members from clinical development, market access, 
human resources, legal, information technology, facilities, 
technical operations and external communications. This 
group is led by the Director of External Communications and 
overseen by the Chief Financial Officer, Head of Corporate 
Affairs, who together provide updates to the Agios executive 
leadership team and Board of Directors.
ESG Oversight by the Board of Directors
Our Board receives updates on ESG and sustainability at 
Agios. Updates come from the CEO, CFO, Head of Facilities 
and Director of External Communications. In addition, 
the Board receives regular updates on human capital 
management from our Chief People Officer.
